amount.label: Amount
amount.help: The amount of the transaction in EUR. Negative amounts are expenses, positive amounts are income.

description.incompleted: The transaction is partially settled: Receipts are present, but the total does not match the transaction amount.
description.empty: The transaction is incomplete: At least one receipt is required.

finance_account.help: The cash register on which the transaction is posted.

import.title: Import Transactions
import.description: Import transactions from your bank by uploading an MT940 file.
